item.title: An aside about flatMap and monads
item.description: This is a very interesting article from Matt Gallagher in which he discusses monads in the context of Swift and itâ€™s flatmap functions. If you are not too familiar with the Haskell programming language, and the concept of a monad, this is a great place to start learning.
